name: Space Float
description:
Space Float

Space Float is the FaSTeam's entry for the #libGDXJam, a game about delivery service in the space.

Install

You will need latest Java Runtime Environment (JRE). If you already have it, just download a desktop build below and double click the JAR file. If it doesn't start, open a command line interface and type java -jar spacefloat-1.0.4.jar

Controls

Move the mouse to rotate the spaceship, click to activate the reactors.

FaSTeam

Antonio Caggiano, Alberto Pastorato
